meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unobtrusive.
meanings.sent1: Her unobtrusivenesses in the classroom made her a favorite among the students.
meanings.sent2: The unobtrusivenesses of the new furniture allowed the room to feel spacious.
meanings.sent3: The unobtrusivenesses of the ninja made him the perfect spy.
meanings.sent4: The unobtrusivenesses of the wind carried the scent of flowers through the air.
meanings.sent5: The unobtrusivenesses of the painting made it blend seamlessly into the gallery.

meanings.definition: The act of not attracting attention or causing disturbance.
meanings.sent1: The unobtrusivenesses of the cat allowed it to sneak up on its prey.
meanings.sent2: The unobtrusivenesses of the library made it a peaceful place to study.
meanings.sent3: The unobtrusivenesses of the mime artist entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The unobtrusivenesses of the night enveloped the city in silence.
meanings.sent5: The unobtrusivenesses of the forest creatures kept them hidden from sight.
